CustomField.description: If this field is checked, an e-mail will be sent to ithelpdesk@newmarketinc.com when the Status is set to "Completed." This field is checked by default when the Project Backlog Task is created. Un-check this field if you do not want a ticket created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this field is checked, an e-mail will be sent to ithelpdesk@newmarketinc.com when the Status is set to "Completed." This field is checked by default when the Task is created. Un-check this field if you do not want an IT Work Ticket created.
CustomField.label: Create IT Work Ticket
